Abilities.name: Blunt Hit
Abilities.description: The user slams a blunt weapon into the target.

Abilities.name: Sear
Abilities.description: The caster burns the enemy with energized mana.
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} flings energized mana at {TARGET}, rending a painful burn.

Abilities.name: Shock
Abilities.description: The caster electrolyzes the air between it and the target, dealing a severe shock.
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} shocks {TARGET} with a bolt of electricity.

Abilities.name: Blood's Theft
Abilities.description: The caster uses arcane powers to extract and absorb life force from the target.
Abilities.use_text: {CASTER} draws forth arcane powers, absorbing the very life force of {TARGET}

effects.trigger_message: {OWNER} is exhausted and loses some stamina! (Stamina -5)
